se.cbb.jprime.mcmc

Interface ProposerWeight

  • All Superinterfaces:
    InfoProvider, TuningParameter
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConstantProposerWeight, LinearProposerWeight

    public interface ProposerWeight
extends TuningParameter
    Represents a weight associated with a Proposer object, ultimately deciding how often the latter will be invoked. At the moment, one may associate multiple Proposer objects with the same weight instance.

    No constraints are made as to the range of valid weights other than that it must be non-negative, although being able to specify an upper limit may be required.

    See also ConstantProposerWeight and LinearProposerWeight.

    Author:
    Joel Sj√∂strand.
